title: Blake's Property: “His name was branded on her skin, would she be able to get over him?”
description: Eleanor loved Blake since she was a teenager. At 19 she had a sizzling affair with him, and when he left her, she thought she was going to die. Seven years later, Blake returns, and he wants back what once belonged to him . An accident would reveal secrets that were buried deep in the vault of time and they would make her see things in a different light. Would Eleanor learn from her past mistakes? Or would she succumb to the lure of the enigmatic, handsome Billionaire?
author: Miri Knox
